r.s: DataStax PHP Driver for Apache Cassandra
r.d: A modern, feature-rich and highly tunable PHP client library for Apache Cassandra and DataStax Enterprise using exclusively Cassandra's binary protocol and Cassandra Query Language v3.
r.n:
# 1.1.0
Features:
* Added support for PHP 7 * Added support for UDTs and tuples * Added support for nested collections * Added access to raw paging token (via `Cassandra\Rows::pagingStateToken()`) * Added support for client-side timestamps and timestamp generators * Added support for retry policys (includes logging, downgrading and fallthrough) * Added the ability to disable schema metadata updates (via `Cassandra\Cluster\withSchemaMetdata()`) * Added support for using named arguments with `Cassandra\SimpleStatement` * Changed the default consistency to `LOCAL_ONE` (from `ONE`)
Bug Fixes:
* [PHP-70] Fixed invalid encoding of decimals and varints
